product_name: Chooze Fresh Spin Swirl Black Shoes - Girls'
long_description: The Chooze Fresh Spin Swirl Black girls' slip-on shoes feature spunky fabrics that let your little girl celebrate her creative energy. Right and left shoes feature same fabric, but design sections are never identical; each shoe is unique. Elastic instep bands help secure the fit. Rubber outsoles offer sure footing on varied terrain; removable, padded EVA insoles. As a Good Returns company, Chooze invests its profits in anti-poverty programs that provide training, support and loans to women so they can start their own businesses.
short_description: The Chooze Fresh Spin Swirl Black girls' slip-on shoes feature spunky fabrics that let your little girl celebrate her creative energy.
